import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './loginForm.scss' export default function Login({onEmailSubmit, onPasswordSubmit}) { const emailRef = useRef() console.log(emailRef.current.value) const passwordRef = useRef() function handleSubmit(esd){ esd.preventDefault() onEmailSubmit(emailRef.current.value) onPasswordSubmit(passwordRef.current.value) } return (

); };
